name: Angelina Bertozzi
description: A celebrated Rome-based chef known for her contemporary twists on classic Italian dishes.

name: Domenico Di Clemente
description: An acclaimed Tuscan chef specializing in traditional rustic fare made with locally sourced ingredients.

name: Giacomo Galli
description: A former Michelin-starred chef now creating bold, inventive Mediterranean-inspired dishes at his eponymous restaurant in Milan.

name: Cristina Bowerman
description: An award-winning sommelier turned chef known for fusing elements of Italian tradition with international influences in her creative plates.

name: Marcello Trentini
description: A Piedmontese chef focused on preserving local culinary traditions by using ancient grains and heirloom produce in updated versions of classic dishes.

name: Andreina De Fazi
description: A respected Sicilian pastry chef creating traditional sweets with fresh, seasonal ingredients and a modern touch.
